name: Leeloo's Premium Taxi Service
description:
Leeloo's Premium Taxi Service is a prototype of 2D side-scrolling game, where the player flyes a taxicab in not so distant future.  The player has to watch out for energy consumption and damage level. The taxicab can be recharged and repaired at dedicated platforms - for a price.

Game design and programming are done by me, Joonas Einola. I also did the graphics, but they are merely placeholder stuff waiting to be placed with something more interesting, if I ever return to this project.
